en.title: About me
en.about: I'm a Full Stack Web Developer, I have knowledge in diverse languajes. Specialized in PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, HTML & CSS, as well as in libraries and frameworks like React and Express JS. I am able to guarantee trust in such areas like both Back and Front End, Database and Methodologies, as well as a good work developement.

workexp.title: Work Experience
workexp.evadb: Took part in 'Eva DB Hospital Manager' proyect developement, for his thesis presentation

es.title: Sobre mi
es.about: Soy un Desarrollador Web Full Stack, tengo conocimientos en diversos lenguajes. Especializado en PHP, JavaScript, MySQL, HTML y CSS, así como en librerías y frameworks como React y Express JS. Soy capaz de garantizar confianza en áreas como Back y Front End, Bases de Datos y Metodologías, así como un buen desarrollo de mi trabajo.

en.title: My Work
en.description: Have a look at the projects I've worked on in the past.

all_projects.title: EVA DB HOSPITAL MANAGER
all_projects.description: CRUD Web Application, made to own digital control over a patient's entry, therapy and departure inside a hospital. Made for the 'Hospital Interzonal General de Agudos Eva Peron' medical staff.
all_projects.roles: Backend Dev, Frontend Dev, Database Dev
